name: gephysio
label: GE physio file converter
description: A tool to synchronize the physiological recording from GE scanners to the fMRI time series. Also filters the raw data and finds the peaks in PPG and respiratory waveform.

plot.description: Flag for plotting segment of physio data.

plot_start.description: Starting time (ms) of the physio plot

plot_window.description: Window width (ms) of the physio plot

author: Hua Wu
